ssot__Individual__dlm.name: Individual
ssot__Individual__dlm.description: The Individual DMO represents contacts, customers, or other people interested in your company's products or services.

ssot__BirthDate__c.description: A person’s birth date including year, month, and date.

ssot__BirthDateDay__c.description: The day the individual was born.

ssot__BirthDateMonth__c.description: The month the individual was born.

ssot__BirthDateYear__c.description: The year the individual was born.

ssot__BirthPlace__c.description: The location the person was born.

ssot__ChildrenCount__c.description: The number of children the person has.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__CurrentEmployerName__c.description: The name of the person’s current employer.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: The reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: The reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeathPlace__c.description: The location of the person’s death.

ssot__DependentCount__c.description: The number of dependents a person claims.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: The reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: The reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__GenderId__c.description: The reference ID for the person’s gender.

ssot__GenderIdentity__c.description: The gender identity of the individual.

ssot__GlobalPartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the global party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group.

ssot__HighestEducationLevelId__c.description: The reference ID to the person’s highest completed education level, for example high school or PhD.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the individual DMO.

ssot__InfluencerRating__c.description: The rating given to a person based on their influence, typically in social media.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: The reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsAnonymous__c.description: An indicator that the person wishes to remain anonymous.

ssot__IsHomeOwner__c.description: An indicator that the person owns a home.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__MailingName__c.description: The person’s full name used for mailing purposes, for example Dr. Jane Doe.

ssot__MainLifeAttitudeTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the individual’s main life attitude type.

ssot__MainLifeStyleTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the individual’s main life style type.

ssot__MaritalStatusId__c.description: A reference ID for a person’s marital status.

ssot__MilitaryServiceId__c.description: A reference ID showing if the person served in the military.

ssot__MilitaryStatusId__c.description: A reference ID for a person’s military status, for example retired or active duty.

ssot__MothersMaidenName__c.description: The unmarried last name of a person’s mother.

ssot__NameSuffix__c.description: The suffix of a person’s name, for example, Jr.

ssot__NetWorth__c.description: The net worth of the individual.

ssot__NoMergeReasonId__c.description: A reference ID to the reason not to merge the individual’s data.

ssot__Occupation__c.description: A description of the person’s job.

ssot__OccupationTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of job a person has for example professional or student.

ssot__OfficialName__c.description: A person’s legal name used in communications.

ssot__OrderingName__c.description: The name used when sorting people in a list, often alphabetical for example, Doe J.

ssot__OverAgeNumber__c.description: The over age number of the individual.

ssot__PartyTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of party, for example, individual or household.

ssot__PartyAdditionalNames__c.description: The additional names associated with the individual.

ssot__PartyRoles__c.description: The role of an individual for example a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__PersonEducations__c.description: Any associated educations for the individual.

ssot__PersonHeightUnitofMeasureId__c.description: A reference ID to the unit of measurement of an individual’s height.

ssot__PersonEmployments__c.description: Any associated employments for the individual.

ssot__PersonLanguages__c.description: Any associated languages for the individual.

ssot__PersonLifeEvents__c.description: Any associated life events for the individual.

ssot__PersonWeightUnitofMeasureId___c.description: A reference ID to the unit of measurement of an individual’s weight.

ssot__PhotoURL__c.description: A link to an individual’s photo.

ssot__PrimaryAccountId__c.description: A reference ID for person’s account.

ssot__PrimaryHobbyId__c.description: A reference ID for a person’s primary hobby.

ssot__PrimaryHouseholdId__c.description: A reference ID for a person’s household.

ssot__PrimaryLanguageId__c.description: A reference ID for a person’s first language.

ssot__ResidenceCaptureMethodId__c.description: A reference ID for how residence information was obtained.

ssot__ResidenceCountryId__c.description: A reference ID for the country where a person resides.

ssot__ResidenceCountryName__c.description: The primary country where a person resides.

ssot__Salutation__c.description: The person’s preferred greeting, for example Ms. or Mx.

ssot__SecondaryCitizenshipCountryId__c.description: A reference ID to the individual’s secondary country of citizenship.

ssot__TaxBracketRange__c.description: The tax bracket range of the individual.

ssot__WebSiteURL__c.description: The link to a person’s website.

ssot__YearlyIncome__c.description: The yearly income for the individual.

ssot__YearlyIncomeCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency for the individual’s year income.

ssot__YearlyIncomeRangeId__c.description: A reference ID to the range for the individual’s year income.
